entry.content: Several high-profile tabletop role-playing games that have been in the works for years are scheduled to finally be released in 2025, setting the stage for a year where players and game masters will truly be spoiled for choice. As Wizards of the Coast finishes its 50th-anniversary rules refresh with the release of a new Monster […]

entry.content: The board game industry has a tough challenge on its hands. The slate of 2024 releases was incredibly strong, and it‚Äôs difficult to imagine this year‚Äôs upcoming games being able to meet that established bar. There is always hope, and each year I am continually stunned with at least a couple of high-concept games that […]

entry.title: The 50 most anticipated new games of 2025 | Gaming ‚Äì Polygon
entry.summary: 2024 was a weird year for video games, if not entertainment in general. While there certainly were major AAA releases, like Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth, Dragon Age: The Veilguard, and Elden Ring: Shadow o...
entry.content: 2024 was a weird year for video games, if not entertainment in general. While there certainly were major AAA releases, like Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth, Dragon Age: The Veilguard, and Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree, it was smaller and indie titles that more or less stole the show. Games like Balatro, Tactical Breach Wizards, […]

entry.content: The holidays are over and the new year has arrived, and that means 365 more days of fresh movies, books, games, TV shows, and anime to get excited about. 2025 already looks like a doozy. entry.content: Boxing is a full-body workout. Deceptively so ‚Äî you‚Äôre just moving your arms, how tough could it be, right? But if you‚Äôre throwing a punch correctly, you‚Äôre putting your entire body into that motion. A boxing punch should involve a whole set of simultaneous movements that engage your legs, your core, your shoulders, and your […]

While the vast majority of this blog is written in Japanese, I write this in English as CADDi has offices and customers in four countries, and has employees from around the world. Lookin‚Ä¶

entry.content: Hamilton‚Äôs quaternion number system is a non-commutative extension of the complex numbers, consisting of numbers of the form where are real numbers, and are anti-commuting square roots of with , , . While they are non-commutative, they do keep many other properties of the complex numbers: Being non-commutative, the quaternions do not form a field. [‚Ä¶]
